title: The Landlady and The Amnesiac - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Acting   Amnesia   Beautiful Female Lead   Books   Business Management   Character Growth   Child Abuse   Cute Children   Cute Story   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Mob Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple Protagonists   Poor to Rich   Pregnancy   Quirky Characters   Singers   Single Parent   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong   Wealthy Characters
author: Lin Mian Mian   林绵绵
description:
When it came to her fate, Luo Bei was the rare one in a million fated to be wealthy and high-ranking.

Luo Bei didn’t believe it at first, until one day she unexpectedly discovered:

The pitiful person next door who suffered under his biological mother’s abuse would become an overbearing CEO with power and influence.

The ill-fated pregnant lady downstairs was the cool CEO’s wife who ran away with his unborn child.

The sallow and emaciated youth living in the basement was a superstar film emperor.

Most importantly, the amnesiac guy working in construction who Grandma picked up was actually an overbearing CEO.

Lastly, she realized she herself seemed to be…>
